content: Scegli qualche frase casuale (solo 2 o 3), registrale e inviaci l'audio a team@tatoeba.org con il titolo "Audio for Tatoeba in <nome della lingua>.
translations: eng:Pick a few random sentences (just 2 or 3), record them, and send us the samples at team@tatoeba.org, with the title Audi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
